Package view

Class FlashcardSubjectPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane
view.FlashcardSubjectPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class FlashcardSubjectPane extends javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane
A view which allows the user to add subjects.
Since:
0.1
Version:
0.2
Author:
Max, MaxHarrisMJH@gmail.com

      Parameters:

      newSubject - Title in which the subject will replace.
